version_description:
+ Shiny new app icon!
+ Fixed a mean ol' bug that was causing some crashes.

+ Shiny new app icon!
+ Fixed a mean ol' bug that was causing some crashes.

Under-the-hood updates for better performance.

We'll be releasing updates fairly regularly as we head into the holiday season. Please reach out with any issues or suggestions. We're always looking for ways to improve.
+ Email us any time: help@jibjab.com
+ Facebook and Twitter: /jibjab

Quick fix for a bug that was causing connection issues for some subscribers.
Quick fix for a bug that was causing connection issues for some subscribers.

Thanks for downloading JibJab Ecards!

+ This release delivers full compatibility with iOS 11.
+ We fixed an issue that prevented some new subscribers from completing their ecard.
+ A few minor tweaks to the iMessage app to make it better than ever.
+ Bug fixes and other improvements.

Tweet at us: @JibJab

P.S. From the main screen, tap the three dots [...] in the top right for a sneak peek at our brand new app, JibJab Camera. We think you'll love it!

Squashing a few bugs.

Season’s Greetings, JibJabbers! We have a special surprise for you, just in time for the holidays! Introducing Clips - your new secret weapon for endless laughs this festive season! Cast up to 5 friends or family in one of our hilarious new 10-second Starring You® video clips - with music! We can’t guarantee it will get you off Santa’s naughty list this year, but it’s a step in the right direction.

We've also made a few additional updates to make JibJab a very merry app this holiday season.

Adding faces just got SUPER fast! Upload a photo with multiple people and we’ll auto-magically suggest faces to save.

NEW Halloween Ecards, Clips and GIFs! You’ll scream when you see the frighteningly hilarious treats we have for you.

Season’s Greetings, JibJabbers! We made casting your family and friends in our holiday videos even easier. Now go share some merriment, for elf’s sake!

This update also includes the usual bug fixes under the hood.

We updated things under the hood that requires a one-time log out. Log back in for love and enjoy our hilariously romantic Valentine’s Day videos and GIFs!

Choosing faces for videos just got SUPER fast! Now drag a face between characters to swap, drag a face off of a character to clear it and tap a character to browse your faces in full-screen.

We're also excited to now support Spanish!

- New! We have added the ability to navigate between screens while previewing, casting and sharing your favorite JibJab content.
- New! Simplified GIF-creation process.
- Plus we included several bug fixes and design enhancements.

New Features!
- Apple Login is now available as a registration option.
- Improved when push notification prompts get triggered.

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Updated copy in Mom screen to remove Mother's Day references.

Be Funny!

New Features!
- Apple Login is now available as a registration option.
- Improved when push notification prompts get triggered.

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Updated copy in Mom screen to remove Mother's Day references.

Be Funny!

New Features!
- You can now enable/disable Apple Login via Social Settings.

Bug fixes and improvements!
- We are now pre-populating the email field when signing up via Facebook.
- We updated the Dad Upsell Screen to remove any Father's Day references.
- We resolved localization issues in which Spanish category names were cut off.
- We resolved issues in which text titles were overlapping on smaller devices.

Be Funny!

New Features!
- You can now enable/disable Apple Login via Social Settings.

Bug fixes and improvements!
- We are now pre-populating the email field when signing up via Facebook.
- We updated the Dad Upsell Screen to remove any Father's Day references.
- We resolved localization issues in which Spanish category names were cut off.
- We resolved issues in which text titles were overlapping on smaller devices.

Be Funny!

Bug fixes and improvements!
- We fixed an issue in which a segment of our users were seeing No Internet Connection even though there is a valid connection.
- We updated the transition animation on GIF screen to be consistent with our other screens.
- We fixed an issue in which part of the text in the text bubble gets cut off when resizing and editing text on GIF screen.
- We fixed an issue in which text added to GIFs shift when edited after shrinking text area.

Be Funny!

- We fixed an issue in which text added to GIFs shift when edited after shrinking text area.

Be Funny!

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Resolved an issue introduced in iOS 14.2 in which users were getting "No Internet Connection" errors when previewing or making videos.
- Resolved an issue in which video wouldn't load on main feed when the # of heads for the account is less than the # of heads in the video.

Be Funny!

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Resolved an issue introduced in iOS 14.2 in which users were getting "No Internet Connection" errors when previewing or making videos.
- Resolved an issue in which video wouldn't load on main feed when the # of heads for the account is less than the # of heads in the video.

Be Funny!

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Resolved an issue in which content with 5 roles only show 1 face.

Be Funny!

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Resolved an issue in which content with 5 roles only show 1 face.

Be Funny!

New Features!
- In addition to Mom & Dad, we've added new relations, such as Me, Partner, Family and Friend.
- Personalize each relation by adding name, birthday, anniversary and as many faces as you want to their profile.
- Organize your faces for faster access in the updated People drawer and Cast screen.

Be Funny!

New Features!
- In addition to Mom & Dad, we've added new relations, such as Me, Partner, Family and Friend.
- Personalize each relation by adding name, birthday, anniversary and as many faces as you want to their profile.
- Organize your faces for faster access in the updated People drawer and Cast screen.

Be Funny!

New Features!
- We have a new updated Home screen that is slowly being rolled out so keep an eye out for it!

Bug fixes and improvements!
- Dropped support for iOS 11
- Under the hood changes to comply with Apple's latest updates to their privacy measures associated with iOS 14
